Reviews.Title: Best Smart Phone for the Money
Reviews.Author: Media Mogul
Reviews.Content: Great business and personal phone. GPS is better than my old iPhone, with turn by turn voice navigation--and it's FREE. QWERTY keys are very easy and responsive. Camera is 5mp and captures DVD quality video, which is amazing for a phone in this price range. Links right up with email services. Screen is bright and works well in sunlight. Comes with business apps, like QuickOffice, and you can get a lot more apps. All-around sleek, sturdy, and powerful phone.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: basingstoke
Reviews.Content: This arrived really fast, within less than a week. The price was decent, a little cheaper than Walmart. So far the product seems perfectly good. I got it activated and working within hours the day it arrived. Be aware, it has the same coverage as AT&T;, so if you don't have that in your area, don't get this phone. For me on the other hand, it's great, because we don't get Sprint service out here in the country, but we do get AT&T.; Just be forewarned.

Reviews.Title: fast business phone
Reviews.Author: sysadmin
Reviews.Content: 600 MHz ARM11 processor, fast phone, great responsive keys, slim design, solid feel, qwerty keyboard, 5mp camera, 3.5 headphone jack great for regular headphones, 3g internet speed, wifi, bluetooth 2.1, Great alternative to blackberry.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT OVERPAY FOR THIS PHONE ON AMAZON (read on)
Reviews.Author: John Raisor
Reviews.Content: I love the phone. It is just like the E71 but faster and with the E71's design flaws corrected. You should know that this phone is available for $9.99 from straight talk. You just have to buy a service card with it. Hopefully this will keep someone from screwing themselves. No I don't work for the company, I just care enough to try an help keep someone from paying 10X more than they should. Happy Hannukah, Merry Xmas, have a killer Quanzaa.

Reviews.Title: love the phone
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Robinson
Reviews.Content: works great, as advertised, only thing i didnt realize is that you are stuck with the 45.00 plan, cant do either, but that is ok, it is a nice phone and comes with a rubber case so if you are a clutz like me and drop your phone alot.

Reviews.Title: Improvements needed but 1000% great phone
Reviews.Author: O'Neal J.
Reviews.Content: It's a great phone not a touch screen but its still a great phone one or two downfall it needs a better App Store nokia's just doesn't do it for me but over all surfing and texting and staying in contact also checking emails this is your phone

Reviews.Title: Nokia E5. Great Ideas with poor implementation.
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone in March 2013. In about 5 months it started to suffer 'out-of-memory' errors. I attempted to remove as much off of the phone's memory as possible (using the Office-FIle Manager dialog) however, even doing that did not alleviate the memory problem. The errors went on for 3 more months. Finally, last night, I guessed that maybe all of the old emails in my Google were using the memory so I deleted them. After that, the phone would never initialize correctly again. I called StraightTalk customer support today. They were unable to fix the E5 over the phone so they decided they would ship me a new phone free of charge after I return the old one (which I am doing tomorrow). The customer service decision to ship a new phone made me very satisfied with the service. The support folks provide a PAID return label for FedEx. The phone is the reason I can only give 2 stars. It has a great many nice features, however, the flaws (memory issues) with the phone make me wonder if I would ever pay $159 for this phone again. The answer is no.

Reviews.Title: No issues
Reviews.Author: Deborah
Reviews.Content: This phone works great as I had expected :) would have liked it to arrive a little sooner, but no issues with the phone itself :)

Reviews.Title: cpuldn't activate
Reviews.Author: Ted Davis
Reviews.Content: Straighttalk wouldn't activate for this area, this was a good buy and not Amazon's fault.I will continue to buy from them.

Reviews.Title: Overpriced
Reviews.Author: AMCBEE
Reviews.Content: You can buy this phone new at Wal-Mart for 149.99 -s&h.; Why so high? Doesn't make much sense to me!

ProductInfo.Features: Thanks for your order item ships within 1-2 days of payment received. Do you agree to contact me if any problems occur once you receive the phone before leaving negative feedback or opening a case against me? I Work with my buyers to make them 100% satisfied. phone is brand new clean imei never activated comes with 1 year straight talk warranty which is simple to exchange with them if any problems happen in the future.
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia E5 Straight Talk
